# Update Component Sheet

#### AOS V2 planned modification
## On Asset Gen complete 
## if ( âœ… success )
### 1. Update 'Content Tracker Google Sheet' / Components_pr_sl
### 2. Append Row to 'Content Tracker Google Sheet' / Assets
## if ( ðŸš© not success )
### 1. Update 'Content Tracker Google Sheet' / Components_pr_sl / component_status == error
### 2. Continue with component gen. Only once deliverable/ sequence has depdendency and has an error, update that thing as failure.

#### AOS V2 planned modification
## On Execute Workflow Trigger to CURRENT production.run.inputs[ ]
### 1. Determine if queried to start a new run or finish existing run (stopped for error, etc.)
### 2a. If starting new, get version_lock row
### - - -  Make some things
### - - -  pv_lock_shot_list -> run_shot_list
### - - -  if making partial run, index pv_lock_shot_list and conver the remaining deliverables
### - - -  update in run sheet page
### - - -  $jmespath run_shot_list into N component items & Append each to Content Tracker Sheet / components_pv_sl
### - - -  If there's errors in any of this, break
### 2b. If continuing existing run
### - - -  Get 1 Row of Run Lock, ALL THAT EQUAL (run_id ?? lock_id && ) Rowsss of Produced Deliverables, Rowsss of Components
### - - -  'subtract completed things' produced deliverables first, then remaining components where component_prod_run_shot_list = [ asset_gen_complete == true âœ… ] run_shot_list from  version_lock row 
### - - -  update Sheet / production_run page's run_shot_list to above
### - - -  Continue as normal from here

json.author: Jalen
json.raw_intake: Morning Coffee Ritual Around the World - An 8-slide mixed media carousel showcasing different coffee brewing methods and cultural coffee traditions from 8 different countries. Educational, visually appealing, and celebration of global coffee culture. Target audience: coffee enthusiasts, travel lovers, cultural appreciation community. Platform: Instagram. Goal: Educational entertainment, cultural appreciation, engagement through coffee passion.
json.logline: Showcase of coffee rituals worldwide in an 8-slide mixed media Instagram carousel to educate and engage coffee and culture lovers.
json.treatment:
Title: "Morning Coffee Rituals Around the World"  
Platform: Instagram  
Deliverable Format: carousel-mixed-media (8 slides: 5 still images, 3 short 5-sec looping videos)  
Optimal Aspect Ratio: 1080 x 1350 px (4:5)  
---------------------------------------------------------
SLIDE-BY-SLIDE STORYBOARD
---------------------------------------------------------
Slide 1 â€“ ETHIOPIA (video â€“ 5 s loop)
 â€¢ Visual concept: Slow-motion close-up of a jebena clay pot pouring dark coffee into small handle-less cups, incense smoke curling in background. Warm sunrise color grade.
 â€¢ AI generation prompt: "Cinematic 5-second loop, Ethiopian buna coffee ceremony, traditional jebena clay pot pouring steaming coffee, soft morning light filtering through woven hut, aromatic incense smoke, depth-of-field focus, 4:5 Instagram video".
 â€¢ Text overlay (animated fade-in): "Ethiopia â€“ Buna Ceremony" (â‰¤24 char)
 â€¢ Supporting graphic: Minimal location pin icon bottom-left.
 â€¢ Alt-text: "Video of Ethiopian buna coffee ceremony with jebena pot pouring steaming coffee into tiny cups."
 â€¢ Key educational bullet for caption: Oldest coffee tradition, 3 rounds (abol, tona, baraka), symbol of hospitality.

Slide 2 â€“ ITALY (image)
 â€¢ Visual: Barista hands sliding a tiny porcelain espresso across a marble bar, bustling Italian cafÃ© in soft blur.
 â€¢ AI prompt: "High-resolution photo, classic Italian espresso bar in Rome, marble countertop, chrome espresso machine glints, barista hand serving single shot, shallow depth of field, morning vibe, 4:5 ratio".
 â€¢ Text overlay: "Italy â€“ Espresso al Banco"
 â€¢ Alt-text: "Still image of barista serving single espresso at a marble bar in Rome."
 â€¢ Educational note: Italians drink standing, quick 30-sec ritual before work.

Slide 3 â€“ TURKEY (video â€“ 5 s loop)
 â€¢ Visual: Overhead shot of cezve bubbling over hot sand, rich foam rising then settling.
 â€¢ AI prompt: "5-second loop, Turkish coffee simmering in copper cezve buried in hot sand heater, bubbles forming, Istanbul street stall setting, 4:5 ratio".
 â€¢ Text overlay: "TÃ¼rkiye â€“ TÃ¼rk Kahvesi"
 â€¢ Alt-text: "Copper cezve brewing Turkish coffee in hot sand, rich foam."
 â€¢ Note: Unfiltered, finely ground, served with lokum, UNESCO intangible heritage.

Slide 4 â€“ JAPAN (image)
 â€¢ Visual: Minimalist kissaten interior â€“ barista performing slow Hario V60 pour-over, steam swirling.
 â€¢ Prompt: "Photo, Japanese kissaten, wooden counter, barista in crisp apron performing meticulous V60 pour-over, wabi-sabi aesthetics, natural light, 4:5".
 â€¢ Text overlay: "Japan â€“ Kissaten Pour-Over"
 â€¢ Alt-text: "Japanese barista making V60 pour-over in a quiet kissaten." 
 â€¢ Note: Emphasis on precision & mindfulness, â€˜third waveâ€™ long before trend.

Slide 5 â€“ VIETNAM (image)
 â€¢ Visual: Condensation on glass as dark coffee drips from phin filter onto thick condensed milk, ice cubes ready.
 â€¢ Prompt: "Macro photo, Vietnamese phin filter dripping coffee into glass with condensed milk, morning street cafe backdrop, vibrant colors, 4:5".
 â€¢ Text overlay: "Vietnam â€“ CÃ  PhÃª Sá»¯a ÄÃ¡"
 â€¢ Alt-text: "Close-up of Vietnamese phin filter coffee dripping onto condensed milk."
 â€¢ Note: Sweet, strong, French colonial influence, popular street drink.

Slide 6 â€“ MEXICO (video â€“ 5 s loop)
 â€¢ Visual: Clay olla pot boiling coffee with cinnamon sticks and piloncillo; camera pulls back to show colorful talavera tiles.
 â€¢ Prompt: "5-sec loop, cafÃ© de olla brewing in traditional clay pot, cinnamon swirling, piloncillo dissolving, Mexican cocina with talavera tiles, 4:5".
 â€¢ Text overlay: "MÃ©xico â€“ CafÃ© de Olla"
 â€¢ Alt-text: "Clay pot brewing Mexican cafÃ© de olla with cinnamon and brown sugar."
 â€¢ Note: Pancho Villa soldiersâ€™ drink, warming spices, communal.

Slide 7 â€“ SWEDEN (image)
 â€¢ Visual: Cozy cafÃ© table with steaming mug and kanelbulle (cinnamon bun), soft morning light through frosted window.
 â€¢ Prompt: "Photo, Swedish fika scene, steaming dark roast coffee, kanelbulle pastry, hygge atmosphere, snow outside window, 4:5".
 â€¢ Text overlay: "Sweden â€“ Fika Break"
 â€¢ Alt-text: "Steaming coffee and cinnamon bun on table during Swedish fika."
 â€¢ Note: Social ritual twice daily, work-life balance.

Slide 8 â€“ AUSTRALIA (image)
 â€¢ Visual: Latte art â€˜flat whiteâ€™ in minimal third-wave cafÃ©, surfer board leaning by door.
 â€¢ Prompt: "Photo, Australian specialty cafÃ©, perfectly textured flat white with fern latte art, bright coastal morning, surfboard in background, 4:5".
 â€¢ Text overlay: "Australia â€“ Flat White Culture"
 â€¢ Alt-text: "Flat white with fern latte art in sunny Australian cafÃ©."
 â€¢ Note: Invented in 1980s, microfoam texture, global specialty-coffee influence.
---------------------------------------------------------
CAPTION (â‰¤2,200 chars â€“ approx. 1,350 here)
â˜•ï¸ Good morning, globe-trotters! ðŸŒ From the highlands of Ethiopia to Australiaâ€™s sunny coast, every culture greets the day with its own coffee ritual â€“ each sip telling a story of history, climate, and community.

1ï¸âƒ£ Ethiopia â€“ Buna ceremony: three rounds shared with neighbors for *baraka* (blessing).
2ï¸âƒ£ Italy â€“ A lightning-fast espresso *al banco* before the commute.
3ï¸âƒ£ TÃ¼rkiye â€“ Thick, unfiltered coffee slowly brewed in hot sand and read in the grounds. â˜•ï¸ðŸ”®
4ï¸âƒ£ Japan â€“ Meditative V60 pour-over in a quiet kissaten, precision meets peace.
5ï¸âƒ£ Vietnam â€“ Strong drip over sweet condensed milkâ€¦ then poured on ice for that Saigon heat. ðŸ§Š
6ï¸âƒ£ MÃ©xico â€“ CafÃ© de olla simmered with cinnamon & piloncillo in a clay pot â€“ smells like cariÃ±o.
7ï¸âƒ£ Sweden â€“ *Fika* break: coffee + conversation + kanelbulle = work-life magic.
8ï¸âƒ£ Australia â€“ Silky flat white, hallmark of the third-wave cafÃ© revolution.

Which cup would you choose to start tomorrow? Tell us your pick & tag a friend youâ€™d share it with! ðŸ‘‡

#CoffeeCulture #MorningRituals #GlobalCoffee #CafeHopping #SpecialtyCoffee #TravelThroughTaste #CoffeeLovers #ThirdWaveCoffee #WorldOfCoffee #OrchardStudios
---------------------------------------------------------
TECHNICAL / PRODUCTION NOTES
â€¢ Still images: generate at 2160Ã—2700 px then downscale to 1080Ã—1350 for crisp quality.  
â€¢ Video slides: export 5-sec MP4, 1080Ã—1350, H.264, â‰¤4 MB, set to loop seamlessly.  
â€¢ Keep on-screen text within 20% safe zone to avoid crop in feed preview.  
â€¢ Use consistent warm color LUT across entire carousel for cohesion.  
â€¢ Add subtle whoosh-in sound to video slides; Instagram auto-mutes by default but enhances replay for users with sound on.  
â€¢ Accessibility: include alt-text (above) when uploading, enable captions for any ambient audio.  
â€¢ Posting schedule: 9:00 AM EST (coffee time).  
â€¢ Engagement tactic: use first comment to list brewing-gear links & resources mentioned in story.  
---------------------------------------------------------
KPIs
â€¢ Save rate â‰¥7% (educational reference)  
â€¢ Carousel completion rate â‰¥45%  
â€¢ Comments with country tags â‰¥75 within 24 h  
---------------------------------------------------------
